Group (2023-present):
ZEROBASEONE

Introduction

Zhang Hao is a Chinese singer under Yuehua Entertainment. He ranked first overall in the 2023 survival show "Boys Planet," securing his spot in the boy group ZEROBASEONE. He is also the first non-Korean center in the history of Korean survial shows.

He made his official debut with the group on July 10, 2023, with the mini album "Youth in the Shade", under the management of WAKEONE.
